mapper.select: select nvl(round(use.cnt / readingroom.cnt ,2), 0) "use" from (select count(*) * 12 cnt from readingroom ) readingroom, (select sum(TO_char(end_time, 'HH24')- TO_char(start_time, 'HH24')) cnt from readingroom_history where to_char(start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy-mm-dd')) use

select nvl(round(use.cnt / readingroom.cnt ,2),0) "use" from (select count(*) * 12 * 2 cnt from readingroom ) readingroom, (select sum(TO_char(end_time, 'HH24')- TO_char(start_time, 'HH24')) cnt from readingroom_history where to_char(start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = TRUNC(sysdate, 'd') or to_char(start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = TRUNC(sysdate, 'd')-1) use

select nvl(round(use.cnt / readingroom.cnt ,2), 0) "use" from (select count(*) * 12 * 5 cnt from readingroom ) readingroom, (select sum(TO_char(end_time, 'HH24')- TO_char(start_time, 'HH24')) cnt from readingroom_history where to_char(start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') between TRUNC(sysdate, 'd')-6 and TRUNC(sysdate, 'd')-2) use
